      • addEntity

        protected void addEntity​(Entity entity)
        Add an Entity to this YaegerScene. An Entity can only be added once.

        This method can only be used to add an instance of Entity during initialisation.If one should be added during the game, a EntitySpawner should be used.

        Parameters:
        entity - the Entity to be added

      • setBackgroundImage

        protected void setBackgroundImage​(java.lang.String url)
        Set the name of the background image file.
        Parameters:
        url - The name of the image file, including extention. Although many different file types are supported, the following types are preferred:
        • jpg, jpeg
        • png

      • setBackgroundAudio

        protected void setBackgroundAudio​(java.lang.String url)
        Set the name of the background audio file. Currently only *.mp3 files are supported.
        Parameters:
        url - The name of the audio file, including extention.

      • onInputChanged

        public abstract void onInputChanged​(java.util.Set<javafx.scene.input.KeyCode> input)
        Implement this method to be informed when a key has been pressed or released.
        Parameters:
        input - A Set containing all keys currently pressed.

      • setRoot

        @Inject
public void setRoot​(javafx.scene.Group root)
        Set the Group to be used. The Group will be the root node of the graph that will be constructed for this Scene.
        Parameters:
        root - the Group to be used

      • setKeyListenerDelegate

        @Inject
public void setKeyListenerDelegate​(KeyListenerDelegate keyListenerDelegate)
